csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">

    <macro name="author">
        <names variable="author">
            <name form="short"/>
        </names>
    </macro>

    <citation>

        <sort>
            <key macro="author"/>
        </sort>

        <layout delimiter="; ">
            <text macro="author"/>
        </layout>

    </citation>

</style>
